sections.description: Luxury Furniture Store WordPress theme has been designed to cater to luxury furniture store owners, manufacturers and managers looking to market their product brand online to improve sale and publicity. If this is the first time to get an online presence for your business and are skeptical because of lack of experience and technical knowledge, there’s a lot more relief in store for you. Luxury Furniture Store WordPress theme is available in ready to upload format; it will save you time and complexities associated with traditional website or web store. No coordinating with web designer or developer, no need to get a hang of technicalities, coding skills; none whatsoever.  Luxury Furniture Store WordPress theme is a simple, clean template designed to custom and edit images and content via convenient and easy to use dashboard that the owner of store can do on his/her own. This modern & creative design is an outcome of an in-depth research that our team undertook before setting out to design it. They spoke to potential buyers as well as people who understood buyer behavior to understand what kind of layout and image and content flow is more likely to click with the visitor for higher conversion. The different sections that you see on the theme will help you share information about your products with your potential customers in a proper sequence. The theme is responsive, that will enable your visitor to connect with you either through mail or social media. We’ve provided social media icons along with space for email id as well as phone number. Browser compatibility ensures your visitor has an uninterrupted view of information and luxury furniture on display.   Thus the intelligence that our designers gathered clearly reflects in the design. Even the color scheme we’ve chosen gives out a vibe that generates buyers’ interest. Images we’ve used have also been picked up after a lot of thought. Buyer of Luxury Furniture Store WordPress theme can keep the same images or replace them with their private images. We invite all the luxury furniture brands & manufacturers who want to open their own showroom online to look at our Luxury Furniture Store WordPress theme. We are confident that you will like it and use it. Installing, and maintaining the theme is quick; loading speed is always going to be in your favor & fast! Download it now! Live Demo: https://www.luzukdemo.com/demo/luxury-furniture-store/
